title: Why Ohio’s Tim Ryan is Democrats’ Most Important 2022 Candidate
sub_head: Ryan’s Ohio Senate candidacy will be testing ground for virtually every key question Democrats face next year
body:
In a 2022 midterm election cycle full of critical races, Tim Ryan in many ways will be the Democrats’ most important candidate.
Mr. Ryan is a House member from blue-collar Ohio—the Mahoning Valley, Youngstown, Akron—who is seeking to win a Senate seat opened up by the retiring Republican Rob Portman. Mr. Ryan’s candidacy will be a testing ground for virtually every key question Democrats face next year:
